segments.text: Daddy , how are you going to spend your weekends ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need to finish my research paper .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you go with me to climb Kiang Shan ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Honey , I am sorry I have no time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , Daddy , you should do more exercise . You are getting a little heavy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am afraid you are right . Recently , even going upstairs makes me out of breath .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then go climbing with me , Daddy . Mountain climbing can build your muscles like Popeyes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Terrific ! It is also a good exercise to keep me fit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I give you my word , you must feel refreshed after mountain climbing .
segments.speaker: S1
